name: Konstantin the Dayborn
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Arena Battles by 30%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places an extra hit if the target is under any debuff.
skills.name: Sword of Suns
skills.books:

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit will ignore 10% of each target's DEF for every [Leech], [Decrease DEF], and [Block Active Skills] debuff they are under.
skills.name: Rune Shatter
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, steals all buffs from the target, then transfers all debuffs from this Champion to the target. 

Decreases the cooldown of the [Quietude] skill by 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Quietude
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Enemies from the Undead Horde, Demonspawn, and Knights Revenant Factions killed by this Champion cannot be revived. 

[All enemies killed by this Champion cannot be revived when Vlad the Nightborn is on the same team.]
skills.name: Exalted [P]
